# MAP EVENTS
###############################################################################

#==============================================================================
Map ID: 001
Map Name: Intro
Tileset: 004: Poke Center
Width: 20, Height: 15

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 001
Event Name: Modified Essentials Intro
(X,Y): (003,014)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \l[3]Which adventure would you like to play? This cannot
 :    : be changed without starting a new game.
@>Show Choices: Pokemon Essentials, Touhoumon Essentials
(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [Pokemon Essentials]
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: When [Touhoumon Essentials]
 @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Self Switch A is ON

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: --- Pokemon Essentials Intro ---
@>Change Text Options: Middle, Hide
@>Text: <ac>\c[8]\l[3](Please refer to the\nPokémon 
 :    : Essentials Wiki\nfor documentation.)
@>Change Text Options: Bottom, Show
@>Prepare for Transition
@>Play BGM: 'begin', 100, 100
@>Show Picture: 1, 'introbg', Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Execute Transition
@>Wait: 18 frame(s)
@>Show Picture: 2, 'introbase', Center (256,256), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Show Picture: 3, 'introOak', Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 2, @15, Center (256,256), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @15, Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 18 frame(s)
@>Text: \bHello! Sorry to keep you waiting!
@>Text: \bWelcome to the world of Pokémon.
@>Text: \bMy name is Oak.
@>Text: \bPeople call me the Pokémon Professor.
@>Label: Help Choices
@>Text: \bIf you need help, I am certainly capable of giving it.
@>Show Choices: Controls, Adventure, No info needed
(When Cancel: Choice 3)
: When [Controls]
 @>Script: pbEventScreen(ButtonEventScene)
 @>Jump to Label: Help Choices
 @>
: When [Adventure]
 @>Text: \bWell then, without further ado...
 @>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(-255,-255,-255,0),10)
 @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 @>Show Picture: 4, 'helpadventurebg', Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
 @>Move Picture: 4, @10, Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
 @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 @>Change Text Options: Middle, Hide
 @>Text: <ac>\c[0]\l[3]You are about to enter a world\nwhere 
  :    : you will embark on a grand\nadventure of your very 
  :    : own.
 @>Text: <ac>\c[0]\l[5]Speak to people and check things\n
  :    : wherever you go, be it in towns,\nroads or caves.\n
  :    : Gather information and hints from\n
  :    : every possible source.
 @>Text: <ac>\c[0]\l[3]New paths will open to you when\n
  :    : you help people in need, overcome\n
  :    : challenges, and solve mysteries.
 @>Text: <ac>\c[0]\l[7]At times, you will be challenged\n
  :    : by others to a battle.\n
  :    : At other times, wild creatures\nmay stand in your way.\n\n
  :    : By overcoming such hurdles,\nyou will gain great power.
 @>Text: <ac>\c[0]\l[2]However, your adventure is not\n
  :    : solely about becoming powerful.
 @>Text: <ac>\c[0]\l[7]On your travels, we hope that\n
  :    : you will meet countless people\n
  :    : and, through them, achieve\npersonal growth.\n\n
  :    : This is the most important\nobjective of this adventure.
 @>Move Picture: 4, @10, Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
 @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 @>Erase Picture: 4
 @>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(0,0,0,0),10)
 @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 @>Change Text Options: Bottom, Show
 @>Jump to Label: Help Choices
 @>
: When [No info needed]
 @>
: Branch End
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Show Picture: 3, 'introMarill', Center (256,220), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,220), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Text: \bThis world is inhabited by creatures we call 
 :    : Pokémon.
@>Text: \bPeople and Pokémon live together by supporting 
 :    : each other.
@>Text: \bSome people play with Pokémon, some battle with 
 :    : them.
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,220), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Show Picture: 3, 'introOak', Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Text: \bBut we don't know everything about Pokémon yet.
@>Text: \bThere are still many mysteries to solve.
@>Text: \bThat's why I study Pokémon every day.
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Move Picture: 2, @10, Center (256,256), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Wait: 15 frame(s)
@>Show Picture: 3, 'Character Selection', Center (256,192), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 2, @10, Center (256,256), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,192), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Text: \bSo, who are you?
@>Show Choices: Renko, Maribel
(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [Renko]
 @>Comment: Initializes player 0 (PlayerA).
  :       : ["pbChangePlayer" takes a value from 0 through 7; 
  :       : other values are not valid. To edit information about 
  :       : a player, choose "Set Metadata" in the Pokemon 
  :       : Essentials Editor and select "Global".]
 @>Script: pbChangePlayer(0)
 @>Show Picture: 3, 'introRenko', Center (256,192), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
 @>
: When [Maribel]
 @>Comment: initializes player 1 (PlayerB)
 @>Script: pbChangePlayer(1)
 @>Show Picture: 3, 'introMaribel', Center (256,192), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
 @>
: Branch End
@>Move Picture: 2, @10, Center (256,256), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,192), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Text: \bNow what did you say your name was?
@>Label: Enter Name
@>Comment: Opens the name entry screen and initializes the 
 :       : trainer object
@>Script: pbTrainerName
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Text: \bSo you're \PN?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \bWhat is your name?
 @>Jump to Label: Enter Name
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: \b\PN, are you ready?
@>Text: \bYour very own Pokémon story is about to unfold.
@>Text: \bYou'll face fun times and tough challenges.
@>Text: \bA world of dreams and adventures with Pokémon 
 :    : awaits! Let's go!
@>Text: \bEnjoy the Starter Kit. You should give credit when 
 :    : using it.
@>Fade Out BGM: 4 sec.
@>Control Self Switch: A =ON
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(-255,-255,-255,0),20)
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 1
@>Erase Picture: 2
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Transfer Player:[003: Introduction Sequence], (025,006), Down
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(0,0,0,0),20)
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>

Page #3
Conditions
Self Switch B is ON

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: --- Touhoumon Essentials Intro ---
@>Change Text Options: Middle, Hide
@>Text: \l[3]Touhoumon Essentials was made by 
 :    : DerxwnaKapsyla. If you use this Development Kit, 
 :    : please give credit.
@>Text: \l[4]Also, please give credit to the people who helped to 
 :    : make Pokemon Essentials. If it wasn't for them, this 
 :    : would not exist right now.
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Text: <ac>\l[3](Please refer to the\nPokémon 
 :    : Essentials Wiki\nfor documentation.)
@>Change Text Options: Bottom, Show
@>Prepare for Transition
@>Script: pbChangePlayer(2)
@>Play BGM: 'W-001. Memory of Forgathering Dream', 70, 100
@>Show Picture: 1, 'introbg', Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Execute Transition
@>Wait: 18 frame(s)
@>Show Picture: 2, 'introbase', Center (256,256), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Show Picture: 3, 'introOak', Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 2, @15, Center (256,256), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @15, Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 18 frame(s)
@>Text: Hello! Sorry to keep you waiting!
@>Text: Welcome to Monsekai, the world of Pokémon and 
 :    : Puppets.
@>Text: My name is Oak.
@>Text: People call me the Pokémon Professor, but I study 
 :    : Puppets now too.
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Show Picture: 3, 'introMarill', Center (256,220), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,220), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Text: This world is inhabited by various creatures far 
 :    : and wide. Some are Pokémon...
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,220), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Show Picture: 3, 'introGoliath', Center (256,190), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,190), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Text: ...And others are Puppets.
@>Text: Some people go out and capture these wondrous 
 :    : creatures. Some play with them like pets, some 
 :    : battle with them. There are all sorts of possibilities!
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,190), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Show Picture: 3, 'introOak', Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Text: But we don't know everything about these beings.
@>Text: There are still many mysteries to solve.
@>Text: That's why I study every day.
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Move Picture: 2, @10, Center (256,256), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Wait: 15 frame(s)
@>Show Picture: 3, 'introBoy', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 2, @10, Center (256,256), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Script: pbChangePlayer(2)
@>Script: pbTrainerName("Red")
@>Text: It's time for your journey to continue, Red.
@>Text: The vast and wondrous world of Pokémon and
 :    : Puppets awaits you! Just go out there and lay
 :    : claim to it once again!
@>Fade Out BGM: 4 sec.
@>Control Self Switch: A =ON
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(-255,-255,-255,0),20)
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Text: Red: ...
@>Script: pbAddToPartySilent(:REIMU,67)
:       : pbAddToPartySilent(:CHEN,65)
@>Script: pbUnlockDex
@>Script: $player.pokegear=true
:       : $PokemonGlobal.runningShoes=true
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 1
@>Erase Picture: 2
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Play SE: 'Exit Door', 80, 100
@>Transfer Player:[042: Fuchsia City], (013,043), Down
@>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(0,0,0,0),20)
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>

Event ID: 002
Event Name: Quick start intro
(X,Y): (000,014)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: This is the Debug intro, used to quickly start a game. 
 :       : The player's name and trainer type are chosen 
 :       : automatically.
@>Script: pbChangePlayer(0)
@>Script: pbTrainerName("Red")
@>Control Self Switch: A =ON
@>Transfer Player:[003: Introduction Sequence], (025,006), Down, No Fade
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(0,0,0,0),20)
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 004
Event Name: Asteria Intro
(X,Y): (000,000)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: SaveData.exists? && $game_temp.begun_new_game
 @>Text: \w[dark]There is a different game file that is already saved.
 @>Text: \w[dark]\l[3]If you save later, the other file's adventure, including items and party members, will be entirely lost.
 @>Text: \w[dark]This will be your only warning. 
 @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: \l[3]Would you like to proceed through Asteria's intro? Skipping this
 :    : segment has no impact on gameplay.
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Comment: --- Jump to Cargo Ship
 @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 @>Script: pbFadeOutIn(99999) { PreludeScene.new }
 @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 @>Change Transparent Flag: Transparency
 @>Script: pbChangePlayer(3)
 @>Script: pbTrainerName("Red")
 @>Script: $player.has_pokegear = true
 :       : $player.has_running_shoes = true
 :       : $player.pokedex.unlock(-1)
 :       : $player.pokedex.unlock(0)
 :       : $player.pokedex.unlock(1)
 @>Transfer Player:[006: Cargo Ship], (013,021)
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Control Variables: [0106: Red vs. Chen] = 1
 @>Script: pbChangePlayer(0)
 @>Comment: --- Jump to Renko and Maribel's house
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,255), @20
 @>Change Transparent Flag: Transparency
 @>Control Switches: [0105: Intro Control Switch] = ON
 @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 @>Script: NewGameScene.new
 @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 @>Transfer Player:[015: Renko & Maribel's House], (033,004), Down
 @>
: Branch End
@>Control Self Switch: A =ON
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0105: Intro Control Switch is ON

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(3,"A",true)
:       : pbSetSelfSwitch(4,"A",true)
@>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch2(7,8,"B",true)
:       : pbSetSelfSwitch2(7,16,"B",true)
@>Control Self Switch: A =ON
@>

#==============================================================================
Map ID: 002
Map Name: Prefab Map
Tileset: 025: Outside (Alternate)
Width: 20, Height: 15

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 001
Event Name: Basic Door - Automatic
(X,Y): (001,002)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: doors3

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Player Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Set Move Route: This event
                  (Ignore If Can't Move)
 :              : $>SE: 'Automatic Door', 100, 100
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Right
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Up
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Set Move Route: Player
                  (Ignore If Can't Move)

 : Else

   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1

 :       : species = [:PIKACHU]
 :       : for id in species
 :       :   party.push(getConst(PBSpecies,id)) if hasConst?(PBSpecies,id)

 :       :   $player.party[i]=nil

 :       : for i in 0...party.length
 :       :   species = party[i]
 @>Script:   $player.party[i] = pbNewPkmn(species,7)
 :       :   $player.seen[species]  = true # Set this species to seen and owned
 :       :   $player.owned[species] = true
 :       : end 
 @>Script: pbTrainerBattle(:SCIENTIST,"Debug",nil,nil,0)
 @>Control Variables: [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] = 5
 @>
: Else
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 1
 @>Script: BattleScripting.setInScript("turnStart0",:Catching_Start)
 @>Script: BattleScripting.setInScript("halfHPOpp",:Catching_Catch)
 @>Script: party = []
 :       : species = [:PIKACHU]
 :       : for id in species
 :       :   party.push(getConst(PBSpecies,id)) if hasConst?(PBSpecies,id)
 @>Script: end
 :       : # Species IDs of the Pokémon to be created
 :       :   for i in 0...$player.party.length
 :       :   $player.party[i]=nil
 @>Script: end
 :       : $player.party.compact!
 :       : for i in 0...party.length
 :       :   species = party[i]
 @>Script:   $player.party[i] = pbNewPkmn(species,7)
 :       :   $player.seen[species]  = true # Set this species to seen and owned
 :       :   $player.owned[species] = true
 :       : end
 @>Script: TrainerDialogue.set("lowHPOpp","halfHPOpp")
 @>Script: pbWildBattle(:PIDGEY,5)
 @>Control Variables: [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] = 5
 @>
: Else
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 2
 @>Script: BattleScripting.setInScript("sendout1Opp",:Opal_Send1)
 @>Script: BattleScripting.setInScript("sendout2Opp",:Opal_Send2)
 @>Script: BattleScripting.setInScript("sendout3Opp",:Opal_Send3)
 @>Script: BattleScripting.setInScript("lastOpp",:Opal_Last)
 @>Script: BattleScripting.setInScript("megaOpp",:Opal_Mega)
 @>Script: BattleScripting.setInScript("attackOpp,4",:Opal_LastAttack)
 @>Script: for i in 0...$player.party.length
 :       :   $player.party[i].level=38
 :       : end
 @>Control Variables: [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] = 5
 @>Script: pbTrainerBattle(:CHAMPION,"Blue",nil,nil,0)
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 3
 @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.nextBattleBGM="BrockBattle"
 @>Script: # Simple text change for showing that this is the 2nd time you're challening Brock
 :       : TrainerDialogue.set("battleStart","You challenge Gym Leader Brock for the 2nd time!")
 @>Script: BattleScripting.setInScript("last",:Brock_LastPlayer)
 @>Script: TrainerDialogue.set("turnStart0",Proc.new{|battle|
 :       : # At the start of the Battle, set Geodude's item to Ring Target.
 :       : # Allows the Pikachu to hit Geodude with Electric Attacks. Plot Armor 100
 :       : battle.battlers[1].item=getID(PBItems,:RINGTARGET)
 :       : })
 @>Script: BattleScripting.setInScript("smlDamageOpp",:Brock_MockPlayer)
 @>Script: BattleScripting.setInScript("recall",:Brock_GiveUp)
 @>Script: TrainerDialogue.set("fainted","Are you giving up already, \\PN?")
 @>Script: BattleScripting.setInScript("halfHP,2",:Brock_Sprinklers)
 @>Script: TrainerDialogue.copy("lowHP,2","halfHP,2")
 @>Script: BattleScripting.setInScript("lowHPOpp,2",:Brock_Forfeit)
 @>Script: party = []
 :       : species = [:PIDGEOTTO,:PIKACHU]
 :       : for id in species
 :       :   party.push(getConst(PBSpecies,id)) if hasConst?(PBSpecies,id)
 @>Script: end
 :       : # Species IDs of the Pokémon to be created
 :       :   for i in 0...$player.party.length
 :       :   $player.party[i]=nil
 @>Script: end
 :       : $player.party.compact!
 :       : for i in 0...party.length
 :       :   species = party[i]
 @>Script:   $player.party[i] = pbNewPkmn(species,12)
 :       :   $player.seen[species]  = true # Set this species to seen and owned
 :       :   $player.owned[species] = true
 :       : end
 @>Script: $player.party[1].pbLearnMove(:AGILITY)
 :       : $player.party[1].pbLearnMove(:SLAM)
 :       : $player.party[1].pbLearnMove(:IRONTAIL)
 :       : $player.party[1].pbLearnMove(:THUNDERBOLT)
 @>Script: $player.party[0].pbLearnMove(:GUST)
 :       : $player.party[0].pbLearnMove(:WINGATTACK)
 :       : $player.party[0].pbLearnMove(:SANDATTACK)
 :       : $player.party[0].pbLearnMove(:TACKLE)
 @>Control Variables: [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] = 5
 @>Script: TrainerDialogue.set("rand10","Ass")
 @>Script: pbTrainerBattle(:LEADER_Brock,"Brock",nil,nil,0)
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Self Switch A == OFF
 @>Text: Hello there! If you're reading this, you're using the Mid
  :    :  Battle Dialogue script by Golisopod User.
 @>Text: Here are a few example battles created using this 
  :    : script. These are included to check out the various
  :    : ways this script can be used to make interesting
  :    : Trainer Battles using Procs.
 @>Text: I'd suggest reading every single line and comment in
  :    : the Procs to get and idea of what this script can do.
 @>Text: You should definitely give credit when using this script.
 @>Text: Have Fun!
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Branch End
@>

@>Scroll Map: Up, 11, 3
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Text: \xn[Gabby]\w[dark]Welcome back to our continued broadcast of the ongoing global crisis.\wtnp[40]
@>Text: \xn[Gabby]\w[dark]We're reporting live from the emergency conference held in Lumiose City.\wtnp[40]
@>Text: \xn[Gabby]\w[dark]Leaders and important figures from across the world have gathered here.\wtnp[40]
@>Text: \xn[Gabby]\w[dark]Today marks day 35 of our continued coverage of the confrence.\wtnp[40]
@>Text: \xn[Gabby]\w[dark]To our knowledge not a whole lot has changed since the last report.\wtnp[40]
@>Text: \xn[Gabby]\w[dark]For those of you just tuning in...\wtnp[40]
@>Text: \xn[Gabby]\w[dark]This confrence was called in response to the current ongoing crisis.\wtnp[40]
@>Text: \xn[Gabby]\w[dark]Over two months ago, an unknown invasive species appeared out of nowhere.\wtnp[40]
@>Text: \xn[Gabby]\w[dark]The number of these species have increased throughout the Hoenn Region...\wtnp[40]
@>Text: \xn[Gabby]\w[dark]... and have been spotted in other regions as well.\wtnp[40]
@>Text: \xn[Gabby]\w[dark]According to officials, these creatures are definitely not Pokemon.\wtnp[40]
@>Text: \xn[Gabby]\w[dark]But beyond that everything else about them is entirely unknown.\wtnp[40]
@>Text: \xn[Gabby]\w[dark]Where they came from, what they're capable of, it remains a mystery.\wtnp[40]
@>Text: \xn[Gabby]\w[dark]Now, earlier this afternoon we recieved an tip from an anonymous source.\wtnp[40]
@>Text: \xn[Gabby]\w[dark]It appears that Professor Samuel Oak will be proposing an idea to the council today.\wtnp[40]
@>Text: \xn[Gabby]\w[dark]However, as of this moment, we have not verified these claims, or this idea.\wtnp[40]
@>Text: \xn[Gabby]\w[dark]We will be bringing you the latest news as we have it.\wtnp[40]
@>Text: \xn[Gabby]\w[dark]This is Gabby of Hoenn TV, reporting once again from the emergency confrence.\wtnp[40]
@>Text: \xn[Gabby]\w[dark]Back to you in the studio, Dave.\wtnp[40]
@>Text: \se[Tile Game cursor]*Click*\wtnp[40]
@>Control Self Switch: A =ON
@>

Event ID: 001

@>Text: Our plan is to stock more and more items, and as we get more stock, start selling older items at a discount.
@>Text: We hope that when we have more stock, you'll come see us again!
@>

 :    : reasons we can't even begin to theorize about.
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]It's almost like some sort of innate, primal instinct, despite Puppets not showing any sort of hostility.
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]As a result of that, the Pokémon Adoption Agency headquarters in the Kikoto
 :    : Continent has temporarily closed their doors, and they've rebranded as a Pokémon Preservation Complex.
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]Their current goal is to bring in displaced Pokémon so they can be helped to
 :    : relocate, and potentially rehabilitate.
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]Another one of my disciples, Blue, works down there as well. She's kept me up to date with their operations.

Event Name: EV026
(X,Y): (010,006)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Wait: 15 frame(s)
@>Move Picture: 1, @20, Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Scroll Map: Up, 15, 2
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]In response to this unprecidented crisis, the various leaders of the world were 
 :    : rounded up to discuss what to do about this situation...
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]There were some... heavy words thrown around, mostly by public opinion as a result of the media's coverage.
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]The whole process lasted for a little over a month.
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]While this was going on, the entire scientific community was working behind the 
 :    : scenes to study these creatures.
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]It was on us to find out as much as we could about them, and reveal our findings to the council.
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]The result of our research? The creatures, while they share no known land
 :    : of origin, or any comparable evolutionary background to Pokémon, were unmistakably
 :    : similar to Pokémon.
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]Similar characteristics, similar abilities, even Pokéballs managed to recognise
 :    : them without any sort of calibration.
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]Our best theory was that they came from another dimension or universe, similar to 
 :    : the subjects of the missing Professor Mohn of the Alola Region.
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]Of course, we had no way to confirm or deny that, and without conclusive proof, that hypothesis was dismissed.
@>Move Picture: 1, @20, Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Change Transparent Flag: Transparency
@>Transfer Player:[012: Cutscene: Confrence Hall], (010,008)
@>Set Event Location: [Professor Oak],(010,010), Up
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (-40,-40,-40,255), @20
@>Comment: ---------
@>Wait: 15 frame(s)
@>Move Picture: 1, @20, Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]When the council asked what we should do with these creatures, it was I who 
 :    : proposed the idea of treating them similarly to Pokémon.
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]Given how similar they were to Pokémon, it only made sense.
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]As they weren't Pokémon, however, the scientific community decided it was best to
 :    : classify them as something else.
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]With their one shared trait being that they resembled tiny humanoids- dolls, to 
 :    : be precise, we collectively agreed to call them Puppets.
@>Move Picture: 1, @20, Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Change Transparent Flag: Normal
@>Transfer Player:[009: Professor Oak's Lab], (014,006), Up
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @20
@>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch2(9,12,"A",true)
@>Control Self Switch: A =ON
@>

@>

@>Text: \xn[\v[108]]Alright, it's my turn to choose now!
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @10
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0007: Starter choice] == 0
 @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(2,"B",true)

 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0007: Starter choice] == 1
  @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(3,"B",true)
  @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(1,"A",true)
  @>
 : Else
  @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(1,"B",true)
  @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(2,"A",true)
  @>
 : Branch End

 :              : $>Turn Up

 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Set Move Route: [Red]
 :              : $>Turn Down

@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]Now that you both have your Puppets, this makes you both official trainers!
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]This means you're both allowed to travel across the world and take on a region's Gym challenge.
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]Scattered across the world's regions are the various Gyms, where strong trainers 
 :    : gather and test would-be champions.
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]At the end of a Gym is the Gym Leader. If you beat them, they will award you with 
 :    : a badge that signifies you overcame them and their challenge.
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]Collecting eight badges from a region will immediately qualify you to challenge that region's Pokémon League.
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]The Pokémon League is the ultimate aspiration for most trainers. They aim to 
 :    : reach that pinnacle and challenge the Elite Four to attain the prestigious title of Regional Champion.
@>Text: \xn[Renko]That sounds really extreme...
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]With trust in your partners and a well formed strategy, you'll find that a trainer can overcome any challenge!
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]But, words can only convey so much...\wt[10] Red, if you would?
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Text: \xn[Maribel]...Professor?
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]Red here will be your final lesson. He shall teach you both what it's like to actually be a Trainer.
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]There's no better teacher than experience, afterall!
@>Show Animation: Player, [Exclaim bubble]
@>Show Animation: [Alt. Heroine], [Exclaim bubble]
@>Text: \xn[Renko]Whoa whoa whoa! We're supposed to battle Red!? Isn't he a super powerful trainer?
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]Not to worry! Red here will be using his Reimu and Chen in battle, this will allow you 
 :    : both to properly test yourselves without it being overwhelming.
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]It'll be you two together fighting him, a more than even matchup if I do say so myself!
@>Text: \xn[Red]...
@>Text: \xn[Maribel]I'm not completely sure about this... But, if Renko and I fight alongside one another,
 :    : we might be able to stand a chance!
@>Text: \xn[Renko]Yeah, totally! Together, there's nothing we can't take on!
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]That's the spirit!
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]Now, Red and I will be in the basement practice arena waiting for you both.
@>Text: \xn[Professor Oak]Whenever you're ready, come join us down there.
@>Comment: -------
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @10
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(5,"A",true)
@>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(6,"A",true)
@>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(7,"A",true)
@>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(9,"A",true)
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @10
@>Script: completeQuest(:Quest6)
:       : activateQuest(:Quest7)
@>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(4,"C",true)
@>Control Self Switch: B =OFF

 :    : and Johto is different compared to regions like

@>Text: Hoenn's climate and ecology allows for berries to be 
 :    : planted out in the wild by the average trainer and

@>Text: Kanto and Johto have specific trees that grow in the 
 :    : region that will replenish berries on a near day-to-
 :    : day basis.

 :    : You can still find berry trees in Hoenn, just like you

  :    : as the Pride and Joy of Vermillion City.

  :    : and won't be back here for a few more months.
 @>

  :    : Olivine City, within the Johto Region.
 @>Text: While not as big and luxurious as the S.S. Anne, she's used 
  :    : for more interregional travel, only transporting people from 
  :    : Johto to Kanto.

  :    : Slateport Docks. She is about on par with our S.S. Anne, but 
  :    : for the Hoenn Region.
 @>Text: The S.S. Tidal is captained by a man named Briney, who was 
  :    : an old seafarer back in his youth.
 @>Text: It often switches between a global cruise liner, a ship that 
  :    : transports people from region to region, and an interregional 
  :    : ship, making it the most versatile of the ships docked here.
 @>
: When [Seagallop Ferry]
 @>Text: The Seagallop Ferries are only used to transport people from 
  :    : Vermilion Harbor to the outlying island chain, the Sevii Islands.
 @>Text: They can only take a few people at a time, so they have 
  :    : nine ships ready for transportation.
 @>
: Branch End

(When Cancel: Choice 2)

 @>Text: The S.S. Echo is a recent addition to the Vermilion Lineup, and 
  :    : is only used to transport people to and from the Kikoto 
  :    : Continent down in the south.
 @>Text: Only a select few are allowed to board the S.S. Echo, and most 
  :    : of them are the people who work at the Pokémon Preservation 
  :    : Complex.
 @>
: When [Nevermind]
 @>

@>Show Animation: [Gold (First Encounter)], [Exclaim bubble]
@>Text: \xn[Hat-Wearing Individual]Oh, I'm sorry, I didn't see you there!

@>Text: \xn[Hat-Wearing Individual]Are you going to challenge them? Good luck, the Gym Leaders are pretty strong!
@>Text: \xn[Hat-Wearing Individual]My name is Gold, I come from the Johto Region!
@>Text: \xn[Gold]I'm traveling across Kanto and Johto to rechallenge the Gym Leaders to sharpen my skills, especially in the wake of this new world we're in.
@>Text: \xn[Gold]It's been an interesting experience so far, and I could use a good workout after slouching for a few years!
@>Text: \xn[Gold]If you're taking on the Gym Challenge, maybe I'll see you again sometime! If I do, we should totally have a battle!
@>Text: \xn[Gold]Catch ya' later!

@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Move Down

 :    : It looks so... retro!

 :    : version can only take you to locations you've already been
 :    : within a region.
@>Text: \xn[Bill]I'm finishing up the relay installation in all Pokémon 
 :    : Centers across Kanto and Johto as we speak!
@>Text: \xn[Bill]I'll spare you the technial details on how it all works
 :    : right now, since I'm sure you two are busy!
@>Text: \xn[Bill]But just imagine it, once I've finished working on this, you'll
 :    : be able to travel to regions across the world with extreme ease!
@>Text: \xn[Bill]Ahahaha, I was just about to ramble again about science,
 :    : wasn't I?
@>Text: \xn[Bill]I should be heading back to my cottage to work on the 
 :    : real deal some more.
@>Text: \xn[\pn]Wait, just one more thing Bill! I've got a question for 
 :    : you.
@>Show Animation: [Bill], [Question bubble]
@>Text: \xn[Bill]Oh? What would that be? If it's more question about this
 :    : "Sealed Realm" of yours, I'm afraid I still can't be of any help!
@>Text: \xn[Renko & Maribel]\b(Definitely suspicious!)
@>Text: \xn[\pn]No, I'm just wondering, are there any areas around here
 :    : that have a volcano?
@>Set Move Route: [Renko/Maribel]
 :              : $>Turn Right
@>Text: \xn[Bill]A volcano? What, like Cinnabar Island?
@>Text: \xn[\pn]Cinnabar Island, alright, that's all I needed to know! Thanks Bill!
@>Text: \xn[Bill]Well, sure I guess! You two take care now!
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Play SE: 'Teleport', 100, 100
@>Wait: 30 frame(s)
@>Play SE: 'teleporter', 100, 100
@>Screen Flash: (255,255,255,255), @10

 :    : to?
@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Turn Left

 :    : to find any clues about the Sealed Realm along the way, be sure
 :    : to contact me!

      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Jump to Label: Start
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \GYou have no room left in the Bag.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \GYou don't have enough money.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Soda Pop - $300]
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 300 or more
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $bag.can_add?(:SODAPOP)
    @>Change Gold: - 300
    @>Script: $bag.add(:SODAPOP)
    @>Text: \GA Soda Pop dropped down!
    @>Control Variables: [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] = Random No. (0...10)
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 0
     @>Conditional Branch: Script: $bag.can_add?(:SODAPOP)
      @>Script: $bag.add(:SODAPOP)
      @>Text: \GBonus! Another Soda Pop dropped down.
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Jump to Label: Start
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \GYou have no room left in the Bag.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \GYou don't have enough money.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Lemonade - $350]

   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $bag.can_add?(:LEMONADE)
    @>Change Gold: - 350
    @>Script: $bag.add(:LEMONADE)
    @>Text: \GA Lemonade dropped down!

    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Else

   @>

  @>

@>Text: Ahoy there! Behind me is the entrance to the Mt. 
 :    : Moon Mining Tunnels.
@>Conditional Branch: Self Switch B == OFF
 @>Text: It's quite a fascinating phenomenon, really. While we 
  :    : were excavating one day, we happened to come 
  :    : across a series of mysterious tunnels.
 @>Text: They all seem to lead somewhere, but we haven't been
  :    : able to figure out just where they lead... It's quite peculiar!
 @>Text: We have managed to find other tunnels that seem to connect
  :    : with this series of tunnels, all across the Tohjo Continent. The
  :    : best part? They all have rare artifacts inside them!
 @>Text: With an almost limitless supply of artifacts coming out of them,
  :    : Curator Miles decided to open the tunnels up to the public, all
  :    : in the hopes of expanding the museum's displays.
 @>Text: First, prospective prospectors would pay a small entrance fee
  :    : to enter the mines, which all goes back to the Museum. This helps
  :    : us pay for upkeeping the mines and the museum.
 @>Text: In return, for the price of admission, visitors can enter the 
  :    : tunnels and search for artifacts of their own.
 @>Text: To limit environmental impact, guests are limited to one visit 
  :    : per day. Wouldn't want the caves to collapse in on us, now 
  :    : would we!
 @>Text: With that all said...
 @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: Would you like to enter the mines? The cost of entry is $5000!
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Conditional Branch: Gold 4999 or less
  @>Text: Sorry, I can't let you in if you don't have the money to pay
   :    : the entrance fee. Come on back when you have enough
   :    : money!
  @>
 : Else
  @>Change Save Access: Disable
  @>Script: pbSetEventTime
  @>Change Gold: - 5000
  @>Text: Yep, all is in order! Feel free to head on in and enjoy
   :    : yourself!
  @>Play SE: 'Door exit', 100, 100
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
  @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
  @>Transfer Player:[214: Mt. Moon Mining Caves], (037,039), Up
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
  @>Wait: 6 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End

Event ID: 001
Event Name: Day Care Man
(X,Y): (002,003)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 18

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.egg_generated?
 @>Text: Ah, it's you!
 @>Text: We were raising your Pokémon, and my goodness, 
  :    : were we surprised!
 @>Text: Your Pokémon was holding an Egg!
 @>Text: We don't know how it got there, but your Pokémon 
  :    : had it.
 @>Text: You do want it, don't you?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Label: ReceiveEgg
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $player.party_full?
   @>Text: You have no room for it right now... Come back 
    :    : when you've made room.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Text: \me[Egg get]\PN received the Egg from the Day-Care 
   :    : Man.
  @>Text: You take good care of it.
  @>Script: DayCare.collect_egg
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: I really will keep it. You do want this Egg, yes?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Jump to Label: ReceiveEgg
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: Well all right then, I'll take it. Thank you.
   @>Text: That is, I don't think we'll ever find another...
   @>Text: No, no, I'm sure we'll find another one. I'm definitely 
    :    : sure of it!
   @>Script: DayCare.reset_egg_counters
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.count == 0
  @>Text: I'm the Day-Care Man.
  @>Text: I help take care of the precious Pokémon of 
   :    : trainers.
  @>Text: Any Pokémon you'd like to have raised you can 
   :    : leave in my wife's care.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.count == 1
  @>Script: DayCare.get_details(-1, 3, -1)
  @>Text: Ah, it's you!\nGood to see you!
  @>Text: Your \v[3] is doing just fine.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.count == 2
  @>Script: DayCare.get_details(0, 3, -1)
  :       : DayCare.get_details(1, 4, -1)
  :       : DayCare.get_compatibility(5)
  @>Text: Ah, it's you!\nGood to see you!
  @>Text: Your \v[3] and \v[4] are doing just fine.
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] == 0
   @>Text: The two play with other Pokémon rather than with 
    :    : each other...
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] == 1
   @>Text: The two don't seem to like each other much.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] == 2
   @>Text: The two seem to get along.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] == 3
   @>Text: The two seem to get along very well.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

  :    : you.

     :    : battle with?

    @>Exit Event Processing

     :    : you.

   : Branch End

   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Conditional Branch: Self Switch A == ON
    @>Jump to Label: TakeBack
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: Very good. Come again.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: Oh, fine, then.\nCome again.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: Ah, it's you! Good to see you. Now, about your 
  :    : Pokémon...
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.get_level_gain(0, 3, 4) && pbGet(4) > 0
  @>Text: By level, your \v[3] has grown by about \v[4].
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.get_level_gain(1, 3, 4) && pbGet(4) > 0
  @>Text: By level, your \v[3] has grown by about \v[4].
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.count == 1
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>Jump to Label: RaiseAnother
  @>
 : Else
  @>Label: TakeBack
  @>Text: Do you want your Pokémon back?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Label: TakeBackChosen
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $player.party_full?
    @>Text: Your Pokémon team is full. Make room, then come 
     :    : see me.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Script: DayCare.choose(
   :       :   _I("Which one do you want back?"),
   :       :   1
   :       : )
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
    @>Text: Very good. Come again.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Script: DayCare.get_details(pbGet(1), 3, 4)
   @>Text: \GIf you want your \v[3] back, it will cost $\v[4].
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Control Variables: [0005: Temp Text Entry] = Gold
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] < Variable [0004: Temp Move Name]
     @>Text: \GYou don't have enough money...
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Change Gold: - Variable [0004: Temp Move Name]
    @>Play SE: 'Mart buy item', 100, 100
    @>Script: DayCare.withdraw(pbGet(1))
    @>Text: \GExcellent\nHere's your Pokémon.
    @>Text: \PN took \v[3] back from the Day-Care Lady.
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.count == 1
     @>Text: \GDo you want to take back the other one, too?
     @>Show Choices: Yes, No
     (When Cancel: Choice 2)
     : When [Yes]
      @>Jump to Label: TakeBackChosen
      @>
     : When [No]
      @>Text: Very good. Come again.
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Else
     @>Text: Very good. Come again.
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>Text: Very good. Come again.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: Very good. Come again.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

 :    : along on outdoor trips to ensure that the children 
 :    : don't get too rough with one another.
@>Text: I can also heal your party if you'd like. Shall I do so?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: Alright, we'll have them patched right up!
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
 @>Text: Chansey, please use Softboiled.
 @>Play SE: '113Cry', 80, 100

 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)

 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)

 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)

  :              : $>Turn toward Player
 @>Text: And there, they should be all healed now!
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: You be good to your partners now! Take care!
@>

(X,Y): (014,015)

Conditions

Graphic: trainer_PAINTER

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Turn Up
@>Text: I wonder which challenge I should take...
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Turn toward Player
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: Oh? Do you know about the two types of challenges 
 :    : the Pokémon League offers?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: Yeah, the Pokémon League has become flexible 
  :    : over the years. It's kinda nice.
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: Well, there's two paths you can take.
 @>Text: The first path is the classic Badge Check path. 
  :    : Trainers have to go across the region and collect the badges.
 @>Text: Once they get a minimum of eight badges from that region, 
  :    : they return here and are granted access into Route 23's 
  :    : Underground, which leads to Victory Road.
 @>Text: Then there's the new path, which allows you to 
  :    : challenge the Pokémon League whenever you want,
  :    : no badges required!
 @>Text: The only thing is, you have to challenge a series of 
  :    : trainers on Route 23, all representing the official 
  :    : gyms in Kanto.
 @>Text: After you beat them, you get to enter the last portion of 
  :    : Victory Road, and it's just a straight path from there to 
  :    : the front doors of the Indigo Plateau!
 @>Text: The Pokémon League really has become versatile 
  :    : over the past few years!
 @>
: Branch End
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Turn Up
@>

Event ID: 001
Event Name: ExitArrow
(X,Y): (004,010)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: Exitarrow_red

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Stop Animation
Always on Top
Trigger: Player Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Player is facing Down
 @>Play SE: 'Door exit', 100, 100
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>Transfer Player:[034: Pallet Town], (016,012), No Fade
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #1

Graphic: NPC 11

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:

 :    : available for purchase. Would you like to buy some?
@>Script: pbPokemonMart([
:       : :POTION,
:       : :ANTIDOTE
:       : ])
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Variable 0110: Plot Control Variable is 7 or above

Graphic: NPC 11

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: Good day miss, we have a decent selection of goods 
 :    : available for purchase. Would you like to buy some?
@>Text: I sell healing items and Status recovery items. Which 
 :    : would you like to pick from?
@>Show Choices: Healing Items, Status Recovery Items, None
(When Cancel: Choice 3)
: When [Healing Items]
 @>Script: setPrice(:POTION,250)
 @>Script: pbPokemonMart([
 :       : :POTION,:SUPERPOTION
 :       : ])
 @>
: When [Status Recovery Items]
 @>Script: pbPokemonMart([
 :       : :ANTIDOTE,:AWAKENING,
 :       : :BURNHEAL,:PARLYZHEAL,
 :       : :ICEHEAL
 :       : ])
 @>
: When [None]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

@>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
@>

 :    : time here?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: The Trainer Academy used to be the Viridian City 
  :    : Trainer House. People would come here daily to 
  :    : battle various trainers.
 @>Text: Eventually, we expanded the Trainer House to serve 
  :    : as both a school and a place to apply said 
  :    : knowledge. 
 @>Text: We have the most up-to-date resources, as well as 
  :    : some books documenting things prior to the Puppet 
  :    : Invasion eight years back.
 @>Text: The upstairs portion of the Academy is where the 
  :    : classroom and bookshelves are.
 @>Text: The downstairs portion is where trainers can battle 
  :    : instructors approved by the facility. They don't give 
  :    : out money or EXP after the battle, though.
 @>Text: That is everything there is to know about the Trainer 
  :    : Academy!
 @>

  :    : Speed Puppet. This usually prioritizes Speed.
 @>

@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 3
 @>Text: The Tech Shard, which evolves puppets into 
  :    : Technical Puppets. This can do a wide variety of 
  :    : things and makes a puppet more versatile.
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 4
 @>Text: The Support Shard, which evolves puppets into a 
  :    : Helper Puppet. This can vary widely, but it usually 
  :    : focuses on helping out the rest of the team.
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 5
 @>Text: The Solar Shard, which evolves puppets into an 
  :    : Advent Puppet. Very few things evolve from this, 
  :    : and their abilities widely vary.
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: For more information about what puppets evolve with 
 :    : which stone, please consult the document "Stone 
 :    : Evolutions" provided in the folder.

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 002
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (007,002)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: This line of code sets the player's current position as 
 :       : the spot they will return to after they lose a battle 
 :       : and lack out.
 :       : Page 2 of this event detects when this happens, and 
 :       : heals the player's Pokémon and wishes them better 
 :       : luck in future.
@>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count = $player.pokemon_count
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6, i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: get_character(4).pattern = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: Every map you can end up in after having all your 
 :       : Pokémon faint (typically Poké Centers and home) 
 :       : must have an Autorun event in it like this one.
 :       : This event fully heals all the player's Pokémon, says 
 :       : something to that effect, and turns the "Starting 
 :       : over" switch OFF again.
@>Comment: For convenience, this can be a single page in an 
 :       : NPC's event (e.g. Mom, a nurse).
@>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
 :    : health.
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Script: for i in 1..$player.pokemon_count
:       :   pbSet(6, i)
:       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
:       :   pbWait(16)
:       : end
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation ON
@>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 58 frame(s)
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Script: get_character(4).pattern = 0
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \rYour Pokémon have been healed to perfect health.
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
 :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
@>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
@>

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: Would you like to trade over the Regional Uplink 
 :    : Terminal?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: Please be advised, our servers were recently 
  :    : hacked, and we are not back to optimal standards.
 @>Text: As a result, an influx of illegally leveled Pokemon and 
  :    : Puppets are making their way through the servers.
 @>Text: Do you still wish to use the Trade system?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: Initalizing trade system, please stand by\..\..\..
   :    : \wtnp[20]\se[computeropen]
  @>Script: pbWonderTrade(1,[],
  :       : [:ARTICUNO,:ZAPDOS,:MOLTRES,:MEWTWO,:MEW,:RAIKOU,:ENTEI,:SUICUNE,:LUGIA,:HOOH,:CELEBI,:REGIROCK,:REGICE,

  :       : :KIKURI,:CSARIEL,:SARIEL,:SSARIEL,:CKONNGARA,:KONNGARA,:CELIS,:ELIS,:CSHINGYOKU,:SHINGYOKUO,:SHINGYOKUM,

 :    : was a Reisen. She looks like she'd be a Reason type 
 :    : but she's actually a Heart type.

 :    : maybe I'll look into that!
@>

 :    : work around the clock to connect the regions of the

 :    : City, and the last one in Sinnoh's Jubilife City.

 :    : and Puppets with other trainers across the world!

 :    : go!
@>Text: If you would like to withdraw or deposit something, 
 :    : please use the PC beside me.

Event ID: 002
Event Name: EV002
(X,Y): (032,005)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Player Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Move Left
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Play SE: '790Cry', 80, 100
@>Show Animation: Player, [Exclaim bubble]
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Script: pbWildBattle(PBSpecies::CKAZAMI,32,1,false,true)
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 1
 @>Text: The wild CKazami fled!
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 2
  @>Text: The wild CKazami removed you from their territory!
  @>Set Move Route: Player
   :              : $>Direction Fix ON
   :              : $>SE: 'faint', 80, 100
   :              : $>Jump: +5,+0
   :              : $>Direction Fix OFF
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 3
   @>Text: The wild CKazami removed you from their territory!
   @>Set Move Route: Player
    :              : $>Direction Fix ON
    :              : $>SE: 'faint', 80, 100
    :              : $>Jump: +5,+0
    :              : $>Direction Fix OFF
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Else
   @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 001
Event Name: CKazami
(X,Y): (014,017)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: OW - Puppet_Kazami

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Control Switches: [0106: Prevent Capture Switch] = ON
@>Control Variables: [0109: Unique Wild Battle] = 1
@>Script: pbPlayCry(659)
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Script: BattleScripting.setInScript("turnStart0",:VsCKazami_Intro)
@>Script: BattleScripting.setInScript("lowHPOpp",:VsCKazami_Evolve)
@>Script: BattleScripting.setInScript("rand0",:VsCKazami_EndureCheck)
@>Script: setBattleRule("cannotRun")
@>Script: WildBattle.start(PBSpecies::CKAZAMI,35)
@>Control Switches: [0106: Prevent Capture Switch] = OFF
@>Control Variables: [0109: Unique Wild Battle] = 0
@>

Page #2
Conditions
None

Graphic: OW - Puppet_Kazami

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: Pokemon.play_cry(:CKAZAMI)
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Script: WildBattle.dx_start([:CKAZAMI, 35], { 
:       :   :nocapture => true, 
:       :   :backdrop => ["Forest_Alt", "Forest_Alt"],
:       :   :outcome => 1,
:       :   :noflee => true
:       : }, 
@>Script: {
:       :   :gender  => 1,
:       :   :ability => :OVERGROW,
:       :   :nature  => :QUIET,
:       :   :shiny   => false,
:       :   :moves   => [:VINEWHIP18, :REST18, :SCARYFACE18, :YAWN18]
:       : }, :VS_CKAZAMI)
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 1
 @>Conditional Branch: Player is facing Up
  @>Comment: Nothing, because this is where I want them to face
  @>
 : Else
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
  @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
  @>Set Event Location: [CKazami],(014,017), Down
  @>Transfer Player:[186: Hidden Grove], (014,018), Up, No Fade
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>Text: \xn[Kazami]\se[Cries\KAZAMI_Alt]!!!
 @>Text: \xn[\pn]\b(Now what's it gonna do!?)
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>Play SE: 'Battle catch click', 80, 100
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>Script: p = Pokemon.new(:KAZAMI,35,$player)
 :       : p.ability = :OVERGROW
 :       : p.learn_move(:HYPERBEAM18)
 :       : p.learn_move(:LEAFBLADE18)
 :       : p.learn_move(:INGRAIN18)
 :       : p.learn_move(:TAUNT18)
 :       : p.record_first_moves
 :       : p.nature = :QUIET
 :       : p.calc_stats
 :       : p.shiny = false
 :       : p.gender = 1
 :       : pbAddPokemonSilent(p)
 @>Text: \me[Battle capture success]The Kazami decided to join you on your adventures!\wtnp[60]
 @>Text: \xn[\pn]Wait, did it just put itself into one of my Pokéballs?
 @>Text: \xn[\pn]But... why?
 @>Change Text Options: Middle, Hide
 @>Text: <i>Because, it saw your strength and decided you would be a worthy 
  :    : companion.</i>
 @>Text: <i>Strength speaks volumes, afterall!</i>
 @>Change Text Options: Bottom, Show
 @>Show Animation: Player, [Exclaim bubble]
 @>Set Move Route: Player
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Right
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Up
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
 @>Text: \xn[\pn]Who said that? Show yourself!
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Change Text Options: Middle, Hide
 @>Text: <i>Well, if you insist!</i>
 @>Change Text Options: Bottom, Show
 @>Set Event Location: [Yuuka],(014,027)
 @>Scroll Map: Down, 4, 3
 @>Set Move Route: [Yuuka]
  :              : $>Move Up
  :              : $>Move Up
  :              : $>Move Up
  :              : $>Move Up
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Set Move Route: Player
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Text: \xn[\pn]\b(She looks exactly like the Kazami puppet I just fought!
  :    : Is she a Puppet that gained the ability to speak?)
 @>Text: \xn[\pn]Who are you?
 @>Text: \xn[???]I am merely a traveler in this world, nobody you need
  :    : to be concerned about!
 @>Text: \xn[\pn]\b(Then why do you give off such a terrifying aura...?)
 @>Text: \xn[???]As I was saying, that Puppet witnessed your strength
  :    : first hand, and decided that joining with you would be a better
  :    : use of its time than sitting here and terrorizing those humans.
 @>Text: \xn[???]You should feel honored that your strength was 
  :    : recognized. Do you not?
 @>Text: \xn[\pn]I guess I do... I wonder why it was terrorizing those
  :    : workers to begin with, then.
 @>Text: \xn[???]For any number of reasons, surely- perhaps they were
  :    : encroaching on its territory. Or, perhaps it was bored.
 @>Text: \xn[???]You, however, are far more interesting.
 @>Text: \xn[\pn]M-Me? Why's that?
 @>Text: \xn[???]Like I mentioned, you have commendable strength. But,
  :    : more than that...
 @>Set Move Route: [Yuuka]
  :              : $>Move Up

  :    : will result in Termination of the Challenge, and you must challenge again.

  :    : The challenger must beat all 5 trainers to be ranked as a
  :    : Regional Champion of the Pokemon League.

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Player Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: Once you advance into the Champion's Chambers, there is no
 :    : turning back. Are you sure you're prepared?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Play SE: 'Teleport', 80, 100
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>Transfer Player:[192: Indigo Plateau - Elite Four], (035,012), Up, No Fade
 @>Play SE: 'teleporter', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>Text: ???: So, you're the challenger that's beaten the four before me, 
  :    : huh?
 @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 @>Text: That's no big surprise, they're all weak. Only the strong can make 
  :    : it here and fight me. Countless others have tried and failed.
 @>Text: But no, not you. You've managed to fight your way here, you 
  :    : are indeed strong. But not strong enough. I only recognize 
  :    : people as such if they can beat me.
 @>Text: You want to know who I am? Humph! I suppose an 
  :    : introduction is in order.
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @0
 @>Play SE: 'Vs flash', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 @>Text: I am the Champion of the Kanto Pokemon League, Silver.
 @>Text: Silver: My longtime goal was to become the strongest trainer 
  :    : in all the world, but my rival, a hotshot trainer from the Johto 
  :    : Region, always kept shooting me down at every turn.
 @>Text: But it was thanks to him and several others that I eventually
  :    : saw the error of my ways. I treated my Pokemon like machines,
  :    : good for nothing but battle.
 @>Text: In an effort to surpass everyone, I became the very 
  :    : thing I told myself I would never become - like my father.
 @>Text: I have spent several years reevaluating myself and my
  :    : decisions, and I've come to a realization - the strong are
  :    : those who raise their Pokemon and Puppets with care, with
  :    : loyalty, and without treating them like slaves.
 @>Text: You may not be my rival, who I swore to one day 
  :    : beat in battle and prove once and for all that I am 
  :    : the stronger, but you are here right now, challenging 
  :    : me to a battle.
 @>Text: Silver: If you want to take home the title of Champion of the
  :    : Kanto Pokemon League, you'll have to best me in battle first!
  :    : I refuse to submit, and the same goes for my puppets. We 
  :    : are a strong and unified threat to anyone before us.
 @>Text: Come at me challenger, with all your might! Show me just
  :    : how powerful you think you are in a fight! Prove you are
  :    : worthy of my respect; I, Silver, Champion of the Kanto Region,
  :    : accept your challenge!
 @>Set Move Route: Player
  :              : $>Move Up
 @>Set Move Route: [Champion - Silver]
  :              : $>Move Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.nextBattleBack="Champion"
 @>Comment: EndSpeech: Humph! I guess it can't be helped!
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: TrainerBattle.start(PBTrainers::CHAMPION_Silver, "Silver", 0)
  @>Play BGM: '', 100, 100
  @>Play SE: 'Door enter', 100, 100
  @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(3,"A",true)
  @>Text: Silver: I've seen enough! This battle is over, and quite the
   :    : battle it was.
  @>Text: My well trained Puppets have been beaten, yours were 
   :    : clearly more well trained than mine were, both physically 
   :    : and respectfully.
  @>Text: After all of that training, I still lost. I need to believe more in 
   :    : my Puppets, and only then can I truly become the strongest 
   :    : trainer!
  @>Text: Silver: You, Challenger \PN! You have bested me in battle!

Event ID: 031
Event Name: Vending machine 1
(X,Y): (031,057)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Player is facing Up
 @>Label: Start
 @>Text: It's a vending machine.\n
  :    : Which drink would you like?\G
 @>Show Choices: Fresh Water - $200, Soda Pop - $300, Lemonade - $350, Cancel
 (When Cancel: Choice 4)
 : When [Fresh Water - $200]
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 200 or more
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $bag.can_add?(PBItems::FRESHWATER)
    @>Change Gold: - 200
    @>Script: $bag.add(PBItems::FRESHWATER)
    @>Text: \GA Fresh Water dropped down!
    @>Control Variables: [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] = Random No. (0...10)
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 0
     @>Conditional Branch: Script: $bag.can_add?(PBItems::FRESHWATER)
      @>Script: $bag.add(PBItems::FRESHWATER)
      @>Text: \GBonus! Another Fresh Water dropped down.
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Jump to Label: Start
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \GYou have no room left in the Bag.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \GYou don't have enough money.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Soda Pop - $300]
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 300 or more
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $bag.can_add?(PBItems::SODAPOP)
    @>Change Gold: - 300
    @>Script: $bag.add(PBItems::SODAPOP)
    @>Text: \GA Soda Pop dropped down!
    @>Control Variables: [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] = Random No. (0...10)
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 0
     @>Conditional Branch: Script: $bag.can_add?(PBItems::SODAPOP)
      @>Script: $bag.add(PBItems::SODAPOP)
      @>Text: \GBonus! Another Soda Pop dropped down.
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Jump to Label: Start
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \GYou have no room left in the Bag.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \GYou don't have enough money.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Lemonade - $350]
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 350 or more
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $bag.can_add?(PBItems::LEMONADE)
    @>Change Gold: - 350
    @>Script: $bag.add(PBItems::LEMONADE)
    @>Text: \GA Lemonade dropped down!
    @>Control Variables: [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] = Random No. (0...10)
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 0
     @>Conditional Branch: Script: $bag.can_add?(PBItems::LEMONADE)
      @>Script: $bag.add(PBItems::LEMONADE)
      @>Text: \GBonus! Another Lemonade dropped down.
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Jump to Label: Start
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \GYou have no room left in the Bag.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \GYou don't have enough money.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Cancel]
  @>Text: \GDecided not to buy a drink.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 002
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (007,002)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired partners to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your team?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your party for a few seconds.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count=$player.pokemonCount
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6,i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("ballshake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: []
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pokemon Healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: []
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour party may have been infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon
   :    : and Puppets.
  @>Text: \rThose that are infeted with it are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your party to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \rFirst, you should let your partners recover to full 
 :    : health.
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Script: for i in 1..$player.pokemonCount
:       :   pbSet(6,i)
:       :   pbSEPlay("ballshake")
:       :   pbWait(16)
:       : end
@>Set Move Route: []
 :              : $>Stop Animation ON
@>Play ME: 'Pokemon Healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 58 frame(s)
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Set Move Route: []
 :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \rYour party has been healed to perfect health.
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
 :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
@>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
@>

Event ID: 004
Event Name: Sidequest NPC
(X,Y): (006,005)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: trainer_WORKER

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: Forgive me, I'm not in the mood to talk right now, I have
 :    : a bit of a situation on my hands.
@>Text: See, I'm the foreman for a project that aims to clear out some extra
 :    : space around Route 2 to make it easier for people to get from
 :    : Viridian to Pewter.
@>Text: Unfortunately, our efforts lately have been met with a snag.
@>Text: A rouge element has taken up residence within the nearby groves
 :    : and any time we try to approach, it drives all my workers away.
@>Text: One of my workers even tried to battle it, but suffice to say they
 :    : were no match for the obstruction.
@>Text: ... You say you wanna see for yourself? Fine by me, kid.
 :    : Just keep your wits about you. We're talking about a Grade S
 :    : terror back there.
@>Text: If it gets too dangerous, pull out. I don't want some stranger's 
 :    : blood on my hands.
@>Script: activateQuest(:Quest111)
@>Control Variables: [0139: Kazami SQ] = 1
@>Control Self Switch: A =ON
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Self Switch A is ON

Graphic: trainer_WORKER

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: Any luck back there kid?
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0139: Kazami SQ] == 2
 @>Text: Oh, you actually managed to capture it? Well I'll be a Chimchar's
  :    : uncle!
 @>Text: You've saved me and my men from annoying paperwork and
  :    : needing to spend money on a specialist to deal with the situation!
 @>Text: Not sure how else I can thank you, but here, take these items we
  :    : found when we were clearing space.
 @>Script: pbReceiveItem(:GRASSGEM)
 @>Script: pbReceiveItem(:MALACHITE)
 @>Text: We got these appraised and, while they aren't worth much, they
  :    : do have special effects. Namely, boosting the power of
  :    : Grass- and Nature-type moves, respectively.
 @>Text: I mostly use Ground- and Electric-Types, so these aren't of any
  :    : use to me. Maybe you'll put them to better use!
 @>Text: For now, I gotta get back to work. Gotta call my supervisor and tell
  :    : him things are back on track!
 @>Control Variables: [0139: Kazami SQ] = 3
 @>Script: completeQuest(:Quest111)
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: Remember, that nightmare is in the grove not too far from 
  :    : this shack.
 @>Text: Good luck.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Always on Top
Trigger: Player Touch

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 002
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (007,002)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: This line of code sets the player's current position as 
 :       : the spot they will return to after they lose a battle 
 :       : and lack out.
 :       : Page 2 of this event detects when this happens, and 
 :       : heals the player's Pokémon and wishes them better 
 :       : luck in future.
@>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count = $player.pokemon_count
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6, i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: get_character(4).pattern = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: Every map you can end up in after having all your 
 :       : Pokémon faint (typically Poké Centers and home) 
 :       : must have an Autorun event in it like this one.
 :       : This event fully heals all the player's Pokémon, says 
 :       : something to that effect, and turns the "Starting 
 :       : over" switch OFF again.
@>Comment: For convenience, this can be a single page in an 
 :       : NPC's event (e.g. Mom, a nurse).
@>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
 :    : health.
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Script: for i in 1..$player.pokemon_count
:       :   pbSet(6, i)
:       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
:       :   pbWait(16)
:       : end
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation ON
@>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 58 frame(s)
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Script: get_character(4).pattern = 0
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
 :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \rYour Pokémon have been healed to perfect health.
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
 :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
@>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
@>

Conditions
