Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: Every map you can end up in after having all your 
 :       : Pokémon faint (typically Poké Centers and home) 
 :       : must have an Autorun event in it like this one.
 :       : This event fully heals all the player's Pokémon, says 
 :       : something to that effect, and turns the "Starting 
 :       : over" switch OFF again.
@>Comment: For convenience, this can be a single page in an 
 :       : NPC's event (e.g. Mom, a nurse).
@>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
 :    : health.
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Script: for i in 1..$player.pokemon_count
:       :   pbSet(6, i)
:       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
:       :   pbWait(16)
:       : end
@>Set Move Route: [PC]
 :              : $>Stop Animation ON
@>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 58 frame(s)
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Script: get_character(4).pattern = 0
@>Set Move Route: [PC]
 :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \rYour Pokémon have been healed to perfect health.
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
 :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
@>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 008
Event Name: EV008
(X,Y): (014,006)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 22

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: Would you like an explanation of how the Pokémon World 
 :    : Tournament works?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: Here in the Pokémon World Tournament, you select a specific 
  :    : tournament to take part in. 
 @>Text: Each tournament consists of three rounds. If you clear all
  :    : three rounds you are awarded with Battle Points.
 @>Text: The amount of Battle Points you earn for winning is dependant
  :    : on the relevant tournament and your win streak within that
  :    : tournament.
 @>Text: Each tournament has its own set of rules, such as restrictions
  :    : on Pokémon, setting all battlers to a specific level.
 @>Text: Each tournament is broken into different challenge modes.
 @>Text: Singles, which allows you to take 3 Pokémon into a one on one
  :    : battle against the other trainers.
 @>Text: Doubles, which allows you to take 4 Pokémon into a two on two
  :    : battle against the other trainers.
 @>Text: Full, which allows you to take all of your Pokémon into a one on one
  :    : battle against the other trainers.
 @>Text: And Sudden Death, where you may only bring in one Pokémon to battle
  :    : against each trainer.
 @>Text: And finally, money and experience is not gained while in a tournament.
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: If you ever need a reminder of how the tournaments work, I'm
  :    : always here to help!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

                  (Ignore If Can't Move)

 :              : $>Move Right

 :              : $>Move Down

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: ......\wt[5] ......

 @>Text: Hello, \PN!\nI can see you calling me over there!
 @>Text: Come over and talk to me.
 @>Jump to Label: End call
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: Hello, this is Professor Oak...\nOh, hello, \PN!
@>Text: So, how's your Pokédex coming along?
@>Show Choices: Evaluate Pokédex, Quit
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Evaluate Pokédex]
 @>Script: pbSet(1,$Trainer.pokedexSeen)
 :       : pbSet(2,$Trainer.pokedexOwned)
 @>Text: Hmm, let's see..\nYou've seen \v[1] Pokémon, and
  :    : \nyou've caught \v[2] Pokémon!\nI see!

  @>Text: Hmm, you still have a long journey ahead of you!
   :    : \nKeep on going!
  @>Jump to Label: End evaluation
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0002: Temp Move Choice] < 75
  @>Text: Hmm, you're catching Pokémon at a decent pace!
  @>Jump to Label: End evaluation
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0002: Temp Move Choice] < 150
  @>Text: You've caught a lot of Pokémon, but make sure you're 
   :    : raising them carefully!
  @>Jump to Label: End evaluation
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0002: Temp Move Choice] >= 150
  @>Text: I didn't even know that many Pokémon existed!
  @>Jump to Label: End evaluation

 : Branch End

 @>Text: Show me your Pokédex again anytime!

@>Label: End call

@>Wait: 5 frame(s)

@>Wait: 25 frame(s)

#==============================================================================
Common Event ID: 085
Common Event Name: Vs. Brock (Backup)

Trigger: None

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: --- Pre-Battle Intro Setup
@>Script: pbSet(1,["Boulder","Cascade","Thunder","Rainbow","Soul","Marsh","Volcano","Earth",
:       :          "Zephyr","Hive","Plain","Fog","Mineral","Storm","Glacier","Rising"][pbGet(113)])
@>Script: pbSet(2,["Brock","Misty","Surge","Erika","Janine","Sabrina","Blaine","Green",
:       :          "Falkner","Bugsy","Whitney","Morty","Jasmine","Chuck","Glacia","Clair"][pbGet(114)])
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
@>Wait: 6 frame(s)
@>Script: pbShowPicture(1,"Transitions/BGs/BGLeader.png",0,0,0,zoomX=100,zoomY=100,opacity=255,blendType=0)
@>Change Picture Color Tone: 1, (-255,-255,-255,0), @0
@>Show Picture: 4, '_Bars', Center (256,192), (100%,100%), 230, Normal
@>Move Picture: 4, @5, Center (256,192), (100%,100%), 230, Normal
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Change Picture Color Tone: 1, (0,0,0,0), @5
@>Move Picture: 1, @180, Upper Left (-4096,0), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 15 frame(s)
@>Play SE: 'Vs flash', 80, 100
@>Screen Flash: (255,255,255,255), @10
@>Script: pbShowPicture(2,"Transitions/PTs/Char_BrockS.png",1,256,192,zoomX=100,zoomY=100,opacity=255,blendType=0)
@>Wait: 25 frame(s)
@>Screen Flash: (255,255,255,255), @10
@>Play SE: 'Vs sword', 80, 100
@>Script: pbShowPicture(3,"Transitions/PTs/Char_Brock.png",1,256,192,zoomX=100,zoomY=100,opacity=255,blendType=0)
@>Script: pbShowPicture(5,"Transitions/Names/Name_Brock.png",1,256,192,zoomX=100,zoomY=100,opacity=255,blendType=0)
@>Script: pbShowPicture(6,"Transitions/Badges/Badge_#{pbGet(1)}.png",1,256,192)
@>Move Picture: 2, @30, Center (250,192), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Call Common Event: Vs. Transition - Balls
@>Wait: 60 frame(s)
@>Change Picture Color Tone: 1, (-255,-255,-255,0), @5
@>Change Picture Color Tone: 2, (-255,-255,-255,0), @5
@>Change Picture Color Tone: 3, (-255,-255,-255,0), @5

@>Move Picture: 1, @90, Upper Left (-4096,0), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 2, @90, Center (250,192), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @90, Center (256,192), (100%,100%), 0, Normal

@>Move Picture: 5, @90, Center (256,192), (100%,100%), 0, Normal

#==============================================================================
Common Event ID: 087
Common Event Name: Vs. Transition - Badge to Ball Check

Trigger: None

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: Checks for how many badges the player has.
 :       : Used for determining the ball count for Gym Leaders.
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.badge_count >= 9
 @>Comment: 10+ Badges
 @>Control Variables: [0104: Vs. Transition - Pkmn] = 6
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.badge_count >= 6
  @>Comment: 7 Badges
  @>Control Variables: [0104: Vs. Transition - Pkmn] = 5
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.badge_count >= 4
   @>Comment: 5 Badges
   @>Control Variables: [0104: Vs. Transition - Pkmn] = 4
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.badge_count >= 1
    @>Comment: 1 Badge
    @>Control Variables: [0104: Vs. Transition - Pkmn] = 3
    @>
   : Else
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.badge_count == 0
     @>Comment: 0 Badges
     @>Control Variables: [0104: Vs. Transition - Pkmn] = 2
     @>
    : Else
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Trigger: None

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: Used for everything that isn't a Gym Leader or Elite Four. 
 :       : So, for trainers that move around.
 :       : So, basically, rival fights.
@>Comment: 0 = Basement, 1 = Black, 2 = Cave, 3 = City,
 :       : 4 = Elite, 5 = Shrine, 6 = Spectral
 :       : 
 :       : More to come
@>Script: pbSet(3,["Basement","Black","Cave","City",
:       :                "Elite","Shrine","Spectral"][pbGet(115)])
:       :                
@>

#==============================================================================
Common Event ID: 089
Common Event Name: Vs. Transition - Flash

Trigger: None

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonEncounters.has_cave_encounters? || PBDayNight.isNight?
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @4
 @>Wait: 4 frame(s)
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @4
 @>Wait: 4 frame(s)
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @4
 @>Wait: 4 frame(s)
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @4
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>
: Else
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @4
 @>Wait: 4 frame(s)
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @4
 @>Wait: 4 frame(s)
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @4
 @>Wait: 4 frame(s)
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @4
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#==============================================================================
Common Event ID: 092
Common Event Name: Sandbox PC

Trigger: None

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: Which function would you like to access?
@>Show Choices: Wonder Trade Uplink, Sandbox ATM, Log Off
(When Cancel: Choice 3)
: When [Wonder Trade Uplink]
 @>Comment: --- Wonder Trade
 @>Text: Accessing the Worldwide Uplink Array.
 @>Text: Please be advised, our servers were recently 
  :    : hacked, and we are not back to optimal standards.
 @>Text: As a result, an influx of illegally leveled Pokémon and Puppets 
  :    : are making their way through the servers.
 @>Text: Is this acceptable?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: Initalizing trade system, please stand by\..\..\..
   :    : \wtnp[20]\se[PC open]
  @>Comment: pbWonderTrade(1,[:MISSINGNO],[:MISSINGNO])
   :       : MissingNo is the only Wonder Trade restriction.
  @>Script: 
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [Sandbox ATM]
 @>Text: Withdrawing $100,000. Thank you for your business!
 @>Change Gold: + 100000
 @>
: When [Log Off]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#==============================================================================
Common Event ID: 093
Common Event Name: Gym Rematch Protocol

Trigger: None

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: Is this acceptable?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Label: Gym Rematch Setup
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGymRematch
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0003: Temp Pokemon Name] == -1
   @>Text: Rematch process canceled.
   @>Jump to Label: Start
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $game_variables[3] != 1
    @>Text: Confirming, you want the team selection that the gym 
     :    : uses set to as if you had \v[3] badges?\ch[1,1,Yes,No]
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: Confirming, you want the team selection that the gym 
     :    : uses set to as if you had \v[3] badge?\ch[1,1,Yes,No]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 0
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $game_variables[3] != 1
    @>Text: This gym has been informed that you wish to 
     :    : rechallenge them, and to treat it as if you had 
     :    : \v[3] badges.
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: This gym has been informed that you wish to 
     :    : rechallenge them, and to treat it as if you had 
     :    : \v[3] badge.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Text: If you wish to cancel your challenge, please interact 
    :    : with the terminal again.
   @>Control Switches: [0118: Gym Rematch in Prog?] = ON
   @>Script: $game_variables[127] = pbGet(129)
   :       : $game_variables[128] = pbGet(2)
   :       : $game_variables[2] = nil
   :       : $game_variables[3] = nil
   @>Script: for event in $game_map.events.values
   :       :   if event.name[/GT_/i]
   :       :     $game_self_switches[[$game_map.map_id,event.id,"B"]] = true
   :       :   end
   :       : end
   :       : 
   :       : $game_map.refresh
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 1
   @>Jump to Label: Gym Rematch Setup
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Jump to Label: Start
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Jump to Label: Start
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Common Event ID: 095
Common Event Name: Yellow Apricorn

Trigger: None

List of Event Commands:
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>SE: 'Apricorn Tree - Shake', 100, 100
 :              : $>Graphic: "Apricorn_2', 0, 2, 1
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "Apricorn_2', 0, 2, 2
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "Apricorn_2', 0, 2, 3
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "Apricorn_2', 0, 2, 0
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "Apricorn_2', 0, 2, 1
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "Apricorn_2', 0, 2, 2
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "Apricorn_2', 0, 2, 3
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "Apricorn_2', 0, 2, 0
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "Apricorn_0', 0, 2, 0
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "Apricorn_0', 0, 4, 0
 :              : $>Script: 
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "Apricorn_0', 0, 4, 1
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "Apricorn_0', 0, 4, 2
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "Apricorn_0', 0, 4, 3
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Conditional Branch: Player is facing Down
 @>Show Animation: This event, [Yellow Apricorn (Back)]
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Player is facing Left
  @>Show Animation: This event, [Yellow Apricorn (Right)]
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Player is facing Right
   @>Show Animation: This event, [Yellow Apricorn (Left)]
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Player is facing Up
    @>Show Animation: This event, [Yellow Apricorn (Front)]
    @>
   : Else
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Wait: 4 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "Apricorn_0', 0, 4, 2
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "Apricorn_0', 0, 2, 0
 :              : $>Wait: 7 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>

: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Player is facing Left
  @>Show Animation: This event, [Pink Apricorn (Right)]
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Player is facing Right
   @>Show Animation: This event, [Pink Apricorn (Left)]
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Player is facing Up
    @>Show Animation: This event, [Pink Apricorn (Front)]
    @>
   : Else
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Wait: 4 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "Apricorn_0', 0, 4, 2
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "Apricorn_0', 0, 2, 0
 :              : $>Wait: 7 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>

#==============================================================================
Common Event ID: 104
Common Event Name: Mining Minigame

Trigger: None

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: This wall looks like it can be dug into. Dig into it?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: rand(100) > 35
  @>Script: pbMiningGame
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: You dig around in the wall for a bit, but find nothing...
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>Control Variables: [0112: Dig Spot Variable] += 1
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

 :       : When copying, COPY THE MOVEMENT FOR OTHER 
 :       : SHADOWS

@>Wait: 4 frame(s)
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (-70,-70,11,68), @4
@>Wait: 8 frame(s)
@>Comment: --- FLASH IS UNIQUE TO AYAKASHI
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
@>Wait: 6 frame(s)
@>Script: pbShowPicture(20,"Transitions/Bars_Under.png",1,256,192,zoomX=100,zoomY=100,opacity=230,blendType=0)
@>Script: pbShowPicture(5,"Transitions/Bars_Over.png",1,256,192,zoomX=100,zoomY=100,opacity=230,blendType=0)
@>Move Picture: 5, @5, Center (256,192), (100%,100%), 230, Normal
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Script: pbShowPicture(1,"Transitions/BGs/BGAyakashi.png",1,256,192,100,100,0,0)
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Move Picture: 1, @5, Center (256,192), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 15 frame(s)
@>Play SE: 'Vs flash', 80, 100
